headline: Ask HN: Did you play in the crypto roulette?
description: Honestly, I always had a bad vibe on crypto. I did buy some bitcoin and ether, and played a little with it but despised the computational complexity for anything. Also gotta confess I lost pretty much all my money on it, but never went on Axie or any P2E game.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你是否参与了加密货币轮盘赌？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你是否參與了加密貨幣輪盤賭？
